publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3570 Anne McLaughlin: Congratulating Momentum Scotland Ltd—That the Parliament congratulates Glasgow-based Momentum Scotland Ltd on its well-deserved award of a £200,000 grant and further £200,000 loan from the Scottish Government’s Scottish Investment Fund; acknowledges the vital role played by Momentum Scotland, which provides employment and training services to people with mental health problems, brain injuries and learning difficulties; commends the inclusive person-centred approach of Momentum Scotland towards people who have, in the past, been socially excluded; recognises the important contribution that the third sector as a whole makes to Scotland’s economy, and notes the Scottish Government’s commitment to supporting the third sector by increasing funding to it by 37%. Supported by: Kenneth Gibson*, Bob Doris*, Rob Gibson*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Bill Wilson*, Robin Harper*
